Package com.sorcix.sirc

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AdvancedListener
    Notified when receiving unknown lines.
    MessageListener
    Notified of new IRC messages.
    ModeListener
    Notified of user mode changes.
    ServerListener
    Notified of server/channel changes.
    SIRCService
    A service plugin running on sIRC.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Channel
    Represents a channel on the IRC server.
    ClientState
    Contains information about an IrcConnection.
    IrcAdaptor
    Implements all sIRC listeners.
    IrcColors
    This class provides mIRC color codes to be used when sending messages.
    IrcConnection
    Main IRC Connection class in sIRC.
    IrcDebug
    Handles debug output on sIRC.
    IrcPacket
    Parses a raw server response into a more readable format.
    IrcPacketFactory  
    IrcServer
    Contains information about an IRC server.
    User
    Represents a user on the IRC server.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NickNameException
    Thrown when the nickname is already in use.
    PasswordException
    Thrown when the nickname is already in use.
